text: (ai rasool) tum kah do ki main tumase naseehat kee bas ek baat kahata hoon (vah) ye (hai) ki tum log baaz khuda ke vaaste ek-ek aur do-do uth khade ho aur achchhee tarah gaur karo to (dekh loge ki) tumhaare rapheeq (mohammad sa0) ko kisee tarah ka junoon nahin vah to bas tumhen ek sakht azaab (qayaamat) ke saamane (aane) se daraane vaala hai
